text.section: On or before December 1 of each year, each institution of higher education in the State that offers a program necessary for the licensing of health care professionals in the State shall report to the Governor and, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the General Assembly on the actions taken by the institution to reduce health disparities.
The Secretary may set standards for the form of the report required under this section.
